short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A browser extension that lists your live followed streamers and notifies you when they go live + more

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Track your favorite streams on Twitch & get notified when they go live.

Simply login with your twitch account so the extension has access to your followers. You will have the ability to choose whether you want to be notified when they go live or not. You can switch between twitch accounts whenever you'd like.

Discover top Twitch streamers and enjoy a preview thumbnail of what they are up to before deciding to visit.
